initial.comments: skips the finalize screen where the user chooses to save as incomplete or finalized and instead saves as finalized

display.text: Aboveground Storage Tanks and Separation Equipment
Tank fill area shows evidence of spillage or overfilling
Tank fill area blocked by trash, equipment or vegetation
Tank fill cover is missing, damaged and/ or is improperly color coded or labeled
Spill buckets are damaged, cracked and/ or contain liquid (note if oil) or debris
Tank pad shows signs of structural damage
Manhole covers are not watertight, missing and/ or not protecting the subsurface UST equipment/ components
Tank vent is obstructed, uncapped and/ or not solidly supported
Automatic tank gauging (ATG) equipment and/ or overfill protection alarms are indicating alarm conditions, are faulty or inoperative
Dispenser fuel islands show signs of spillage or staining
Dispenser hanging hardware (hoses/ nozzles) show signs of defect and are leaking
Spill response material is missing or damaged or needs replacement
Spill/ threat of a release reporting procedures with emergency contacts are not conspicuously posted
